Events that occurred on 4 July.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1966 – The Jerusalem Bible is published.
1972 – Letter 339 is published in the Daily Telegraph.
1972 - Mythcon 3 in Long Beach, California ends.
2006 - The Gathering of the Fellowship convention in Toronto.
2015 - The Tolkien Society Seminar at the Hilton, Leeds.
2020 - The Tolkien Society Seminar is held online due to the Covid-19 pandemic.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Boromir sets out from Minas Tirith to ask for counsel at Rivendell.
